sourcesContent:
<template>
    <section class="users__wrapper">
        <transition-group name="user-list">
        <user-item
                v-for="user in users.slice(pageFirst,pageLast)"
                :key="user.id"
                :user="user"
        />
        </transition-group>
    </section>
    <nav class="pagination__wrapper">
        <users-pagination
                v-for="pageNumber in totalPages"
                :key="pageNumber"
                :pageNumber="pageNumber"
                :class="{'pagination__active': page === pageNumber}"
                @click="changePage(pageNumber)"
        />
    </nav>
</template>
<script>
import UserItem from '@/components/MySlider/UserItem'
import {mapState, mapMutations, mapActions} from 'vuex'
import UsersPagination from "./UserPagination";
export default {
    name: 'user-slider',
    components: {
        UsersPagination,
        UserItem,
    },
    data () {
      return {
          page: 1,
          pageFirst: 0,
          pageLast: 5,
          totalPages: 1,
      }
    },
    methods: {
        ...mapMutations({
            setUsers: 'TestModule/setUsers',
        }),
        ...mapActions ({
            fetchUsers: 'TestModule/fetchUsers'
        }),
        changePage (pageNumber) {
            this.page = pageNumber;
            this.pageFirst = 5 * this.page - 5;
            this.pageLast = 5 * this.page;
            /*if(this.pageFirst === 0){
              this.pageFirst = this.pageFirst + 5;
                if (this.pageLast){}
            }*!/*/
        }
    },
    computed:{
        ...mapState({
            users: state => state.TestModule.users,
        }),
    },
    mounted() {
        //console.log(this.users);
        this.totalPages = Math.ceil(this.users.length / 5);
        this.fetchUsers();
    },
}
</script>
<style lang="sass" scoped>
.users__wrapper
   display: flex
   flex-direction: row
   gap: 10px
.pagination__wrapper
    display: flex
    flex-direction: row
    justify-content: center
    margin-top: 16px
    gap: 5px
.pagination__active
    color: blue !important
    background: white !important
    border: 2px solid blue !important
.user-list-enter-active, .user-list-leave-active
    transition: all 1s ease

.user-list-enter-from, .user-list-leave-to
    opacity: 0.5
    right: 200vw

.user-list-move
    transition: 1s ease
</style>
